an4.3:1: "Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavati. Katamehi catūhi.
an4.3:2: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṁ, bahuñca puññaṁ pasavati. Katamehi catūhi.
an4.3:3: Yo nindiyaṁ pasaṁsati,Taṁ vā nindati yo pasaṁsiyo;Vicināti mukhena so kaliṁ,Kalinā tena sukhaṁ na vindati.
an4.3:4: Appamatto ayaṁ kali,Yo akkhesu dhanaparājayo;Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā,Ayameva mahantataro kali;Yo sugatesu manaṁ padosaye.
an4.3:5: Sataṁ sahassānaṁ nirabbudānaṁ,Chattiṁsatī pañca ca abbudāni;Yamariyagarahī nirayaṁ upeti,Vācaṁ manañca paṇidhāya pāpakan"ti.
